org.finra.herd.service.helper

Class NamespaceSecurityHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.service.helper.NamespaceSecurityHelper

  • @Component
public class NamespaceSecurityHelper
extends Object
    Helper for checking permissions based on given parameters.

      • NamespaceSecurityHelper

        public NamespaceSecurityHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • checkPermission

        public void checkPermission(Object object,
                            NamespacePermissionEnum[] permissions)
        Checks the current user's permissions against the given object which may represent a single or multiple namespaces. Allowed types are String or Collection of String.
        Parameters:
        object - The string or collection of strings which represents the namespace
        permissions - The set of permissions the current user must have for the given namespace(s)

      • checkPermission

        public void checkPermission(String namespace,
                            NamespacePermissionEnum[] permissions)
        Checks the current user's permissions against the given namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace
        permissions - The permissions the current user must have for the given namespace

      • getAccessDeniedException

        public org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException getAccessDeniedException(List<org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException> accessDeniedExceptions)
        Constructs a new access denied exception by concatenating the given list of exceptions.
        Parameters:
        accessDeniedExceptions - List of exceptions to concatenate
        Returns:
        A new AccessDeniedException

      • getAuthorizedNamespaces

        public Set<String> getAuthorizedNamespaces(NamespacePermissionEnum... permissions)
        Gets a set of namespace codes which the current user is authorized for the given permissions.
        Parameters:
        permissions - List of permissions to query
        Returns:
        Set of namespace codes
